name: Experiment R - Brackeys Jam 2020.2
description:
(Full screen for the best experience)

~~Game Info~~

Play as the super-powered test subject, R, as you navigate your way through a series of chambers with a horrible feeling that you're being watched. Rewind and stop time to solve puzzles, and maybe figure a way out!

This is my entry for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2. The theme was REWIND and we had 7 days. Had a really fun time building this, hope you have a fun time playing! 

~~Controls~~

A/D - Left/Right

Space - Jump

Left Arrow - Rewind Time

Down Arrow - Stop Time

Up Arrow - Normal Time

Hold R - Reset (when available)

~~Known Bugs~~

It's possible to teleport out of the map on the level with two opposite conveyors. (Should be able to hold R to return to the game)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thanks for checking out my submission!

(Windows download below if HTML is messing you around)
